00004  * the ROSS timer API is not so great..

00007 void
00008 epi_timer_cancel(tw_event * timer, tw_lp * lp)
00009 {
00010         if(!timer->memory)
00011                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "No membuf on timer!");
00012 
00013         tw_memory_free(lp, timer->memory, g_epi_fd);
00014         timer->memory = NULL;
00015 
00016         rn_timer_cancel(lp, &timer);
00017 }
00018 
00019 tw_event *
00020 epi_timer_start(epi_agent * a, tw_event * timer, tw_stime ts, tw_lp * lp)
00021 {
00022         if(!timer || timer == lp->cur_event || timer->state.b.abort == 1)
00023         {
00024                 timer = NULL;
00025                 timer = rn_timer_init(lp, ts);
00026         } else
00027         {
00028                 rn_timer_reset(lp, &timer, ts);
00029         }
00030 
00031         if(NULL != timer)
00032                 timer->memory = (tw_memory *) a;
00033 
00034         if(timer && timer->state.b.abort == 1)
00035                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "abort timer?");
00036 
00037         return timer;
00038 }
